_header: There is no man that ever has need
Subjects: Christ, address to humankind; death, power of
_description: Advice of Christ to man — nine couplets

Lincoln91.First Lines:
There es no man þat euer hase nedeȜe schall hym charme
                    & aske no medeAnd here sall I lere it theAs þe Iewis wondide
                    me…
Lincoln91.Last Lines:
…Bot a waye mote þu wendeTo þe erthe & þe
                    stane
